figure_1: A, Cardiac magnetic resonance imaging 12/2017 – 3.13 cm mass; B, Magnetic resonance enterography 01/2019 – 3.39 cm mass; C, CT without contrast 08/2021 – 3.88 cm mass; and D, CT without contrast 04/2022 – 4.90 cm mass.
figure_2: Linear growth speed of the paraganglioma.
figure_3: A, Maximal intensity projection of DOTATATE PET showing a single positive uptake corresponding to the aortocaval space mass; B, Axial view of DOTATATE PET at the level of the mass; C, Merged axial view of DOTATATE PET and CT; D, Axial view of CT at the level of the mass; and E, Coronal view of DOTATATE PET. Arrows: paraganglioma.
